alert.note: Alert for Dixon (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 19 at 7:40PM CDT until April 19 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN DIXON AND SOUTHWESTERN UNION COUNTIES... At 738 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Ponca State Park, or near Ponca, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Public. At 725 PM, the public reported quarter size hail in Ponca. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Elk Point. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
